Open Source libraries

Credit:
Chris DeBrodie Wallpaper Set Wallpaper Blur Wallpaper Pick Wallpaper Unable to blur Unnamed // Intro Skip Let\'s start. OpenLauncher Thank you for choosing Open Launcher. It\'s fully open source and still in development. Here\'s a short intro on how to use it … Minibar Swipe right from the left border of your screen to open the Minibar. There you can find the settings, change the wallpaper, and do lots of other stuff. Settings You can configure your desktop, the app drawer, and the dock … Just try it out! // MiniBar Edit items Set the wallpaper or blur it Lock the screen immediately, requires device administration. Free the ram, force close other running services. Shortcut to device settings. Shortcut to OpenLauncher settings. Pick themes. Open the volume dialog. // About About Open Launcher Open Source libraries Rate Developer Contributors Helped me a lot with bugs and suggestions. Added some settings, German translation. // Settings Settings Columns Rows Pick icon pack Unable to grab the icon without READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE permission. (experimental) Desktop style Drawer style Paged Vertical Normal Show all apps (Experimental) Desktop Dock App drawer Colors Icons Others Style Choose between different styles for your desktop. Search bar Display a search bar on top of the desktop. Size Set the desktop grid size. Fullscreen Enable fullscreen for your desktop. Fast swipe Drawer Swipe on your desktop to open the app drawer. Fast click Drawer Click on your desktop to open the app drawer. Desktop indicator Show the page indicator on the desktop. Label Show app and folder names in the dock. Size Set the dock size. Style Choose between paged and vertical view for the app drawer. Card Use a card as drawer background. Search bar Will only appear in vertical view layout. Size Set the drawer grid size. Remember last page The app drawer will save the last opened page. Dock Dock background color. Drawer Drawer background color. Folder and card Background color for folders and the app drawer card. Label Label color for folders and the app drawer. Size Size of all app icons. Icon pack Select an installed icon pack. Hide apps Hide selected apps from launcher. Restart Restart the launcher in case it\'s behaving weird. Backup Backup and restore your settings. Backup Restore Successfully done. Something went wrong. //Icon hide Hello world! Searching for installed apps. Please wait. No apps selected. Show all apps in drawer?
